title: State v. Ronnie Long – Episode 4 – Forensic Files
description:
April 2, 2018 / The Undisclosed team discusses evidence that wasn’t turned over to Ronnie Long until decades after he was convicted and his prospects for a new trial.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions.

Thank you to The Economist, Boll & Branch, and Stamps for sponsoring this episode!

www.Economist.com/Undisclosed

www.BollandBranch.com Promo code: Undisclosed 

www.Stamps.com Enter: Undisclosed

#undisclosed #freeronnielong
